languages.text: {n}Эдельтрад вздрагивает и хватается за плечо — на ваших глазах рукав его камзола лопается, и сквозь ткань пробивается два костяных нароста.{/n} "Что за ритуал ни творит там Кунрад... варп слишком силен, я не могу ему противостоять. Я чувствую, как меняется тело... как варп звенит в воздухе... Это конец. Мы сгинем в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g}... вместе с {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патентом{/g} и всеми наследниками династии. Враг Человечества торжествует победу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эдельтрад вздрагивает и хватается за плечо — на ваших глазах рукав его камзола лопается, и сквозь ткань пробивается два костяных нароста.{/n} "Что за ритуал не творит там Кунрад... варп слишком силен, я не могу ему противостоять. Я чувствую, как меняется тело... как варп звенит в воздухе... Это конец. Мы сгинем в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g}... вместе с {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патентом{/g} и всеми наследниками династии. Враг Человечества торжествует победу".

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad shudders and grabs his shoulder. As you watch, the sleeve of his jacket bursts open, and two bone growths pierce through the fabric.{/n} "No matter what ritual Kunrad is performing there... the warp is too strong, I cannot withstand it. I feel my body changing with every second... The warp is ringing in the air... This is the end. We will perish in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}... along with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and all the dynasty's heirs. The enemy of Humanity has triumphed."
languages.original_text: {n}Эдельтрад вздрагивает и хватается за плечо — на ваших глазах рукав его камзола лопается, и сквозь ткань пробивается два костяных нароста.{/n} "Что за ритуал ни творит там Кунрад... варп слишком силен, я не могу ему противостоять. Я чувствую, как меняется тело... как варп звенит в воздухе... Это конец. Мы сгинем в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g}... вместе с {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патентом{/g} и всеми наследниками династии. Враг Человечества торжествует победу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad glances over his shoulder at the defaced bridge, at the countless corpses, at Voigtvir's figure looming over the strange writings on the deck.{/n} "This is the end. We will perish in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}... along with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and all of the dynasty's heirs. The enemy of Humanity is victorious."

I feel my body changing with every second... as the warp rings in the air... This is the end. languages.text: {n}エデルスラドは身体を震わせて自身の肩をつかむ。その様子を眺めていると、エデルスラドの上着の袖が破れ、2本の骨の突起が布から突き出す。{/n}「クンラッドがそこでどんな儀式をしようと…<歪み>が強すぎて私は耐えられぬ。毎秒、この身体が変わっていくのが感じる…<歪み>が大気に響いている…。これで終わりだ。私たちは{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}の中で死ぬ…{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}も、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の後継者も全員、共に消える。人類の敵が勝利したのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad shudders and grabs his shoulder. As you watch, the sleeve of his jacket bursts open, and two bone growths pierce through the fabric.{/n} "No matter what ritual Kunrad is performing there... the warp is too strong, I cannot withstand it. I feel my body changing with every second... The warp is ringing in the air... This is the end. We will perish in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}... along with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and all the dynasty's heirs. The enemy of Humanity has triumphed."

traits.locale_text: {n}エデルスラドは身体を震わせて自身の肩をつかむ。その様子を眺めていると、エデルスラドの上着の袖がはじけ、別々に成長した2本の骨が布から突き出す。{/n}「クンラッドがそこでどんな儀式をしようと…<歪み>が強すぎて私は耐えられぬ。毎秒、この身体が変わっていくのが分かる…<歪み>が大気に響いている…。これで終わりだ。私たちは{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}の中で死ぬ…{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}も、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の後継者全員も、共に消える。人類の敵が勝利したのだ」

{n}エデルスラドは身体を震わせて自身の肩をつかむ。その様子を眺めていると、エデルスラドの上着の袖が破れ、2本の骨の突起が布から突き出す。{/n}「クンラッドがそこでどんな儀式をしようと…<歪み>が強すぎて私は耐えられぬ。毎秒、この身体が変わっていくのが感じる…<歪み>が大気に響いている…。これで終わりだ。私たちは{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}の中で死ぬ…{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}も、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の後継者も全員、共に消える。人類の敵が勝利したのだ」

languages.text: {n}艾德萨德颤抖着，抱住自己的双肩。他的外套衣袖当着你的面突然爆开，两根骨刺刺了出来。{/n}“虽然不知道昆拉德正在举行什么仪式……可亚空间的力量实在是太强了，我根本无法承受。我感到自己的身体每分每秒都在发生变化……亚空间本身在空间中回荡……这就是结局了。我们会在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}里……连同那张{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}，以及王朝所有的后裔……一同葬身于此。人类之敌取得了最后的胜利。”
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad shudders and grabs his shoulder. As you watch, the sleeve of his jacket bursts open, and two bone growths pierce through the fabric.{/n} "No matter what ritual Kunrad is performing there... the warp is too strong, I cannot withstand it. I feel my body changing with every second... The warp is ringing in the air... This is the end. We will perish in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}... along with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and all the dynasty's heirs. The enemy of Humanity has triumphed."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾德萨德颤抖着，抱住自己的双肩。他的外套衣袖当着你的面突然爆开，两根骨刺刺了出来。{/n}“虽然不知道昆拉德正在举行什么仪式……可亚空间的力量实在是太强了，我根本无法承受。我感到自己的身体每分每秒都在发生变化……亚空间本身在空间中回荡……这就是结局了。我们会在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}里……连同那张{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}，以及王朝所有的后裔……一同葬身于此。人类之敌取得了最后的胜利。”

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad tressaille et agrippe ses épaules, tandis qu'une des manches de sa veste est brusquement transpercée par deux excroissances osseuses.{/n} « Le rituel qu'accomplit Kunrad n'y change rien... Le Warp est trop puissant pour que je puisse le supporter. Je sens que mon corps se transforme à chaque seconde qui passe... C'est la fin. Nous allons périr dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}... avec la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} et les héritiers de la dynastie. L'ennemi de l'humanité a gagné. »
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad shudders and grabs his shoulder. As you watch, the sleeve of his jacket bursts open, and two bone growths pierce through the fabric.{/n} "No matter what ritual Kunrad is performing there... the warp is too strong, I cannot withstand it. I feel my body changing with every second... The warp is ringing in the air... This is the end. We will perish in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}... along with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and all the dynasty's heirs. The enemy of Humanity has triumphed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad tressaille et agrippe ses épaules, tandis qu'une des manches de sa veste est brusquement transpercée par deux excroissances osseuses.{/n} « Le rituel qu'accomplit Kunrad n'y change rien... Le Warp est trop puissant pour que je puisse le supporter. Je sens que mon corps se transforme à chaque seconde qui passe... C'est la fin. Nous allons périr dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}... avec la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} et les héritiers de la dynastie. L'ennemi de l'humanité a gagné. »

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad schaudert und packt dich bei den Schultern. Vor deinen Augen platzt der Ärmel seiner Jacke auf und zwei Knochenauswüchse durchstechen den Stoff.{/n} "Welches Ritual Kunrad dort auch durchführt ... der Warp ist zu stark, ich kann ihm nicht widerstehen. Ich spüre, wie mein Körper sich mit jeder Sekunde verändert ... Der Warp dröhnt in der Luft ... Das Ende ist gekommen. Wir werden im {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} sterben ... zusammen mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} und allen Erben der Dynastie. Der Feind der Menschheit hat gesiegt."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad shudders and grabs his shoulder. As you watch, the sleeve of his jacket bursts open, and two bone growths pierce through the fabric.{/n} "No matter what ritual Kunrad is performing there... the warp is too strong, I cannot withstand it. I feel my body changing with every second... The warp is ringing in the air... This is the end. We will perish in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}... along with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and all the dynasty's heirs. The enemy of Humanity has triumphed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad schaudert und packt dich bei den Schultern. Vor deinen Augen platzt der Ärmel seiner Jacke auf und zwei Knochenauswüchse durchstechen den Stoff.{/n} "Welches Ritual Kunrad dort auch durchführt ... der Warp ist zu stark, ich kann ihm nicht widerstehen. Ich spüre, wie mein Körper sich mit jeder Sekunde verändert ... Der Warp dröhnt in der Luft ... Das Ende ist gekommen. Wir werden im {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} sterben ... zusammen mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} und allen Erben der Dynastie. Der Feind der Menschheit hat gesiegt."

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad se estremece y se agarra el hombro. Al verlo, la manga de su chaqueta se abre de golpe y dos protuberancias óseas atraviesan la tela.{/n} «Da igual qué ritual esté haciendo Kunrad ahí... La disformidad es tan fuerte que no puedo soportarlo. Siento que mi cuerpo cambia a cada segundo... La disformidad se palpa en el aire... Se acabó. Vamos a morir en la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}... al igual que la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} y todos los herederos de la dinastía. El enemigo de la Humanidad ha salido victorioso».
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad shudders and grabs his shoulder. As you watch, the sleeve of his jacket bursts open, and two bone growths pierce through the fabric.{/n} "No matter what ritual Kunrad is performing there... the warp is too strong, I cannot withstand it. I feel my body changing with every second... The warp is ringing in the air... This is the end. We will perish in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}... along with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and all the dynasty's heirs. The enemy of Humanity has triumphed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad se estremece y se agarra el hombro. Al verlo, la manga de su chaqueta se abre de golpe y dos protuberancias óseas atraviesan la tela.{/n} «Da igual qué ritual esté haciendo Kunrad ahí... La disformidad es tan fuerte que no puedo soportarlo. Siento que mi cuerpo cambia a cada segundo... La disformidad se palpa en el aire... Se acabó. Vamos a morir en la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}... al igual que la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} y todos los herederos de la dinastía. El enemigo de la Humanidad ha salido victorioso».

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad ürpererek omzunu kavrıyor. Ceketinin kolu gözlerinin önünde yırtılıyor ve iki uzantı, kumaşı delerek ortaya çıkıyor.{/n} "Kunrad orada nasıl bir ayin yapıyor olursa olsun... Öteboyut çok güçlü, dayanamıyorum. Bedenimin her geçen saniye değiştiğini hissediyorum... Havada öteboyutun çınlaması var... Sonumuz geldi. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyutta{/g} yok olacağız. {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g} ve hanedanlığın tüm vârisleriyle beraber. İnsanlığın düşmanı zaferine ulaştı."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad shudders and grabs his shoulder. As you watch, the sleeve of his jacket bursts open, and two bone growths pierce through the fabric.{/n} "No matter what ritual Kunrad is performing there... the warp is too strong, I cannot withstand it. I feel my body changing with every second... The warp is ringing in the air... This is the end. We will perish in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}... along with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} and all the dynasty's heirs. The enemy of Humanity has triumphed."

Bedenimin her geçen saniye değiştiğini hissediyorum... Havada öteboyutun çınlaması var... As you watch, the sleeve of his jacket bursts open, and two bone growths pierce through the fabric.{/n} "No matter what ritual Kunrad is performing there... the warp is too strong, I cannot withstand it.
